title: cheaters and scripters
body: why are people doing this? ive been playing with so many people that are using cheats and scripts. last game i was playing the entire enemy team was cheating and using scripts. PLEASE RIOT FIX THIS I CANT HANDLE CHEATERS

replies.body: I doubt they were all cheating lol. The chances of getting 1 is very very low. To get 5 is just impossible. And i also dont think people script in bronze lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UNBAjXyg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-21T08:37:47.009+0000)
>
> I doubt they were all cheating lol. The chances of getting 1 is very very low. To get 5 is just impossible. And i also dont think people script in bronze lol.

People scrpt in bronze just like every rank but more often that not to piss people off rather than climb because thell get caught
ashe`s ult stuns... it did not stun and he did not have items to stop the effect of the stun

Depends. Champions like sivir can use spellshield to block it off or using QSS (QuickSilver Sash) which then forms mercurial scimitar.

I've been called out for scripting quiet alot since I am fairly good at dodging skill shots which is also known as side-stepping.

Excuse me, that is just either a bug or you missed it, or someone else blocked it.

No script can actually hack the game, they can only do things that are possible but VERY VERY hard.
